Now resting comfortably, Nightshift comically wakes himself up while purrin=
g in his sleep.  He rolls over onto his stomach and reads the message.  A r=
eflection on the screen shows a pair of cat like eyes and a muzzle full of =
whiskers.  He then looks at a pair of large black paws with thick paw pads.=


" Sweet, that wasn't a dream after all.  He did it, Holy Slag, he did it.=
"

He gets up on his paws and climbs down off the bench.  Slowly he skulks =
into the room where he had been instructed to go.  He quietly pads up behin=
d Lord Elder and puts a gentile paw on his shoulder.

" Guess who."

Don't =
be envious of what you don't have, be grateful for things you already posse=
s.  Nothing is worth more than family and friends.

On Nov 5, 2011, at 4:48=
 PM, "supercyclonus" <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> LORD ELDER sat on =
the bridge of the ARK in the large metal typically reserved as for the vess=
el's commander. The only light in the room came from the various computer r=
eadouts from the consoles positioned around the room and the large view scr=
een that was positioned in front of him. The image being displayed was that=
 of the jungle that had caught the attention of the MAXIMALS and the PREDAC=
ONS of late. 
> 
> He had been given all the information that had been avai=
lable to him and it was still frustrating little. 
> 
> He reached over and=
 opened a com link and entered his own private security code into it and fr=
owned as the computer reported back, "The resource you are attempting to co=
ntact is not available."
> 
> LORD ELDER sighed as he turned to look back a=
t the screen as he opened another com link, this one not needing the securi=
ty code. "Bump. What is the status of our injured personnel?"
> 
> There wa=
s a pause and then BUMP responded, "Polar Claw and his team are fully recov=
ered and Nightshift is nearly complete as well, his new beast mode has been=
 fully integrated into his systems."
> 
> "Good." There was a nod from ELDE=
R as BUMP was speaking. "What of Silverbolt?" ELDER asked as he glanced bac=
k at the screen. 
> 
> "I was touch and go for a while there." BUMP said ca=
refully, "But he is recovering nicely as well."
> 
> LORD ELDER grunted, "E=
xcellent. Have them meet me in conference room 1 when they come online."
> =

> "What?" BUMP said as if caught of guard. "You can't be . . . "
> 
> "Yes=
 I am." LORD ELDER cut in. "You have your orders. Carry them out." ELDER's =
voice was uncharacteristically curt and commanding. There was a lot on his =
processor lately, and from the looks of things it would only get worse. 
> =

> "Of course, yes sir." BUMP responded in a sullen manner. He was not one =
to take orders easily, but even he could hear something strange in ELDER's =
voice. 
> 
> A message was sent to NIGHTSHIFT's recharging chamber indicati=
ng that when he was recovered to report to conference room #1.
> 
> (TAG)
>=
 
> Preston
> 
>

<html><body bgcolor=3D"#FFFFFF"><div>Now resting comfortably, Nightshift co=
mically wakes himself up while purring in his sleep.  He rolls over on=
to his stomach and reads the message.  A reflection on the screen show=
s a pair of cat like eyes and a muzzle full of whiskers.  He then look=
s at a pair of large black paws with thick paw pads.</div><div><br></div><d=
iv>" Sweet, that wasn't a dream after all.  He did it, Holy Slag, he d=
id it."</div><div><br></div><div>He gets up on his paws and climbs down off=
 the bench.  Slowly he skulks into the room where he had been instruct=
ed to go.  He quietly pads up behind Lord Elder and puts a gentile paw=
 on his shoulder.</div><div><br></div><div>" Guess who."</div><div><br>Don'=
t be envious of what you don't have, be grateful for things you already pos=
ses.  Nothing is worth more than family and friends.</div><div><br>On =
Nov 5, 2011, at 4:48 PM, "supercyclonus" <<a href=3D"mailto:supercyclonu=
s@...">supercyclonus@...</a>> wrote:<br><br></div><div></div=
><blockquote type=3D"cite"><div>




<span style=3D"display:none"> </s=
pan>



    <div id=3D"ygrp-text">
      
      
      <p>LORD ELDER sat on=
 the bridge of the ARK in the large metal typically reserved as for the ves=
sel's commander. The only light in the room came from the various computer =
readouts from the consoles positioned around the room and the large view sc=
reen that was positioned in front of him. The image being displayed was tha=
t of the jungle that had caught the attention of the MAXIMALS and the PREDA=
CONS of late. <br>
<br>
He had been given all the information that had been=
 available to him and it was still frustrating little. <br>
<br>
He reached=
 over and opened a com link and entered his own private security code into =
it and frowned as the computer reported back, "The resource you are attempt=
ing to contact is not available."<br>
<br>
LORD ELDER sighed as he turned t=
o look back at the screen as he opened another com link, this one not needi=
ng the security code. "Bump. What is the status of our injured personnel?"<=
br>
<br>
There was a pause and then BUMP responded, "Polar Claw and his tea=
m are fully recovered and Nightshift is nearly complete as well, his new be=
ast mode has been fully integrated into his systems."<br>
<br>
"Good." Ther=
e was a nod from ELDER as BUMP was speaking. "What of Silverbolt?" ELDER as=
ked as he glanced back at the screen. <br>
<br>
"I was touch and go for a w=
hile there." BUMP said carefully, "But he is recovering nicely as well."<br=
>
<br>
LORD ELDER grunted, "Excellent. Have them meet me in conference room=
 1 when they come online."<br>
<br>
"What?" BUMP said as if caught of guard=
. "You can't be . . . "<br>
<br>
"Yes I am." LORD ELDER cut in. "You have y=
our orders. Carry them out." ELDER's voice was uncharacteristically curt an=
d commanding. There was a lot on his processor lately, and from the looks o=
f things it would only get worse. <br>
<br>
"Of course, yes sir." BUMP resp=
onded in a sullen manner. He was not one to take orders easily, but even he=
 could hear something strange in ELDER's voice. <br>
<br>
A message was sen=
t to NIGHTSHIFT's recharging chamber indicating that when he was recovered =
to report to conference room #1.<br>
<br>
(TAG)<br>
<br>
Preston<br>
<br>
<=
/p>

    </div>
